name: milkinside.zip
items: Milk inside a bag of Milk inside a bag of Milk.sh

attr.title: Milk inside a bag of Milk inside a bag of Milk ...
attr.desc: Milk inside a bag...  is a small visual novel, showing either funny abstraction and wordplay or painful psychological episodes. The claim that history is based on real events will be too specific, so it is easier to pretend that it is just a set of abstractions and wordplay.
attr.inst: Buy and Download the itch.io version https://nikita-kryukov.itch.io/pmkm and extract the zip. Then go into the extracted zip and copy out of game/archive.rpa into the milkinside/gamefiles on your device
